articles.content:
England footballer Ella Toone joked today that she taught Harry Kane how to chip a goalkeeper when asked about his praise for her goal in the Euro 2022 final.

articles.title: Luke Donald named Europe's Ryder Cup captain after Henrik Stenson was stripped of the role - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stenson was appointed captain on March 15, but the Swede's tenure lasted just 127 days before he was sacked for breaking his contract by joining the Saudi-backed LIV Golf series.
articles.content:
Luke Donald said that no amount of Saudi money could persuade him to walk out on the Ryder Cup after being confirmed as Europe's captain.
